TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ScrollBarRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用來呈現具有視覺化樣式之捲軸控制項的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a scroll bar control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組`static`可以用來呈現具有目前作業系統的視覺化樣式捲軸控制項的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a scroll bar control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 這非常有用，如果要繪製的自訂控制項，應該具有目前的視覺化樣式外觀。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要繪製捲軸，可使用這個類別中方法的組合來呈現在捲軸的各個部分。To draw a scroll bar, use a combination of the methods in this class to render each part of the scroll bar. 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的工作區，這個類別的方法將會繪製捲軸目前的視覺化樣式。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the scroll bar with the current visual style. 否則，這個類別的方法將會擲回。Otherwise, the methods of this class will throw an . 若要判斷是否可以使用這個類別的成員，您可以檢查的值屬性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 這個類別會包裝的功能設定為其中一個項目所公開類別。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用的自訂控制項繪製捲軸的滑鼠點選回應的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the methods to draw a scroll bar that responds to mouse clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DrawArrowButton (System.Drawing.Graphics g, System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ScrollBarArrowButtonState state);

public: static void DrawArrowButton(System::Drawing::Graphics ^ g, System::Drawing::Rectangle bounds, System::Windows::Forms::VisualStyles::ScrollBarArrowButtonState state);

span.span: The used to draw the scroll arrow.
The that specifies the bounds of the scroll arrow.

param.name: state
param.span: 其中一個 值，指定捲動箭號的可見狀態。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the visual state of the scroll arrow.

summary.span: 繪製具有視覺化樣式的捲動箭號。

span.span: Draws a scroll arrow with visual styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法之前, 您應該確認屬性會傳回`true`。Before using this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用中自訂控制項的方法方法，取決於滑鼠指標位置的狀態繪製捲軸箭號。The following code example uses the method in a custom control's method to draw a scroll arrow in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#2)]

exception.span: 作業系統不支援視覺化樣式。

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-

exception.span: 使用者已停用作業系統中的視覺化樣式。

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-

exception.span: 視覺化樣式不適用於應用程式視窗的工作區。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

A that specifies the size of the sizing handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 調整大小控點的大小取決於目前作業系統的視覺化樣式。The size of the sizing handle is determined by the current visual style of the operating system. 使用此方法之前, 您應該確認屬性會傳回`true`。Before using this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`.

-or-

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-

exception.span: 視覺化樣式不適用於應用程式視窗的工作區。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
